ygData.subject: Re: Mez'ing IG's
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I really hope this is due to that missing resist message bug. It s really stupid making a mob immune to a spell effect, and not giving the players a
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 20 Jan 2000, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
> > As for the giants, I worked with single mes, spell
> > called Entrance. AND IT WORKED. Mebbe just for a short
> > time, but it worked, cuz I received a note 'IG has
> > been entranced', which is always good to hear.
> > <snip>
>
> The message will still display, but the ice giant will keep on
> swinging. You cannot stun, mez, or otherwise hold those things
> still unless it's your pet. They just shrug it off, otherwise.
> A good example of this for bards is pixie strike, try pixieing
> a giant, you'll get the glaze over message and the giant will
> keep on trucking.

I really hope this is due to that missing resist message bug.
It's really stupid making a mob immune to a spell effect, and
not giving the players a resist/immune message.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
